attributes.action: Hold a live two hour PM's Question Time once or twice per month with members of the public instead of MPs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are questions which have been asked by the public but have never been adequately answered by the PM, and are unlikely to be asked in the house. Therefore I ask the PM to answer these questions in a broadcast live open forum directly to the public (the questions answered on Youtube would not count in this instance as there is always the possibility of taking 'embarrassing' questions out of the list).

This would allow public opinion to reach the PM in a less diluted form than it seems to at present, and may actually put the government back in touch with the people they claim to be working in the best interests of.
